info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southern Cleveland and northern Cherokee Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Gaffney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gaffney, Boiling Springs NC, Blacksburg, Grover, Patterson Springs, Earl, Cowpens National Battlefield, Cliffside, Cherokee Falls and Draytonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
